Package com.azure.spring.cloud.resourcemanager.implementation.crud

Class AbstractResourceCrud<T,K,P>

java.lang.Object
com.azure.spring.cloud.resourcemanager.implementation.crud.AbstractResourceCrud<T,K,P>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of resource.
K - The type of resource key.
P - Azure resource properties.
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourceCrud<T,K,P>
Direct Known Subclasses:
EventHubNamespaceCrud, EventHubsConsumerGroupCrud, EventHubsCrud, RedisCacheCrud, ResourceGroupCrud, ServiceBusNamespaceCrud, ServiceBusQueueCrud, ServiceBusTopicCrud, ServiceBusTopicSubscriptionCrud, StorageAccountCrud
public abstract class AbstractResourceCrud<T,K,P> extends Object implements ResourceCrud<T,K,P>
Abstract Azure resource manager.
